content: विकॄ {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To scatter, throw about; strew or spread about; <ls>Ku. 3. 61</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 59</ls>; <ls>Bk. 1. 3</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To split, cut to pieces; असिर्गात्रं गात्रं सपदि लवशस्ते विकिरतु <ls>Māl. 5. 34.</ls> {@--3@} To pollute, contaminate. {@--4@} To dissolve.
